name: ND Shortcodes
author: Nicdark

sections.description:
Some components in the preview below

The plugin adds some useful components to your page builder ( Elementor or WP Bakery Page Builder ) that can be integrated very easily with your own theme.
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate the plugin.
  2. Be sure that you have the plugin WP Bakery Page Builder or Elementor actived in your theme.
  3. Go in your pages/posts and find the new components in the new tab of your Page Builder dashboard
  4. Enjoy it 😉

Contact Forms 7 broken since version 6.9

By w3bsolutions on December 28, 2023

The developer does not seem to read the issues reported in the forum here. The CF7 integration is broken since 4 versions (6 months ago) and is still not fixed.

Errors

By alexio101 on October 12, 2023

Old version (6.6) has security vulnerabilities and new newer versions break contact forms . They dont even reply to support requests.

Will there be an update ?

By thomasbischoff on May 12, 2021

I have WordPress 5.7.1, will nd shortcodes receive an update ?

Easy to use!

By Anitei Alina (aniteialina22) on July 24, 2020

I am not a programmer and this plugin helps me a lot.

deceptive

By Anonymous User 14293447 (anonymized_14293447) on March 8, 2020

Not even half of the shortcodes visible in the screenshot are available, and to make things worse the Italian translation sucks therefore is misleading!

Not so good.

By jsrit on September 6, 2022

I was hoping for more powerful. It is not working and showing errors.

Warning: this plugin installs a new tab "WP Theme"

By mengeco on March 12, 2017

Warning: this plugin installs a new tab "WP Theme" for "Wedd Planner" which offers paying themes. I don't like this commercial approach! And the features do not add anything compared to those of Visual de Composer.

Very Cool!

By mirkoaligo90 on September 20, 2016

Very Cool! ;)

Easy to use!!!

By rocksanty82 on September 20, 2016

Amazing plugin with a lot of components very easy to use with detailed documentation!
